industry_trends.title: The Rise of Virtual Concerts
industry_trends.summary: Virtual concerts have become increasingly popular, offering artists new ways to reach audiences.

industry_trends.title: Streaming Services Reshape Film Distribution
industry_trends.summary: Streaming platforms are increasingly becoming the primary distribution channel for new films, impacting traditional cinema releases.

recent_deals.deal_title: Top Athlete Secures Endorsement with Sports Brand
recent_deals.deal_summary: Jane Smith, a leading athlete, has signed a lucrative endorsement deal with ABC Sports.
